member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Domain.Entities.CodeItem
member.summary: Base class for entities that have a minimum of code/description fields.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Domain.Entities.CodeItem.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The code which must not be null or empty.
The description which must not be null.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Domain.Entities.CodeItem.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified is equal to this instance. Two instances of the same CodeItem shall be considered equal if their code values are equal.
member.param: The to compare with this instance.
member.returns: true if the specified is equal to this instance; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Domain.Entities.CodeItem.GetHashCode
member.summary: Returns a hash code for this instance.
member.returns: A hash code for this instance, suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures like a hash table.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Domain.Entities.CodeItem.Code
member.summary: An internal code value.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Domain.Entities.CodeItem.Description
member.summary: A user-facing description or "translation" of the code.

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Domain.Entities.GuidCodeItem
member.summary: Base class for entities that have a minimum of GUID, code and description fields.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Domain.Entities.GuidCodeItem.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The GUID which must not be null or empty. Will be converted to lowercase.
The code which must not be null or empty.
The description which must not be null.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Domain.Entities.GuidCodeItem.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified is equal to this instance. Two instances of the same GuidCodeItem shall be considered equal if their GUID and code values are equal.
member.param: The to compare with this instance.
member.returns: true if the specified is equal to this instance; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Domain.Entities.GuidCodeItem.GetHashCode
member.summary: Returns a hash code for this instance.
member.returns: A hash code for this instance, suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures like a hash table.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Domain.Entities.GuidCodeItem.Guid
member.summary: The Globally Unique ID (GUID) for this code. Always in lowercase.
